title: Why does the Boards have to go in backwards chronological order?
body:
You can either view the 'Best' or 'New'...shouldn't there be one which is opposite to 'New' since 'New' is practically backwards from time?

{{champion:157}} {{item:3087}}

replies.body: There's an option for this above where you comment, see image attached!
There's 'Hot' which is recent threads that are gaining attention. That's basically your old top 3-5 threads on GD.
